name: CASE_SAVINGS
description: The CASE_SAVINGS table contains information about savings associated with case records, such as the amount, type of savings, and reason for savings.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SAVINGS_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the savings user.

columns.name: SAVINGS_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: SAVINGS_REVERSAL_LINE
columns.description: Holds the line number of the savings-related group that this line is a reversal of.
